explains: adj. 苏丹（人）的，苏丹文化的

sentences.en: The origins, though not the cause of Ebola-Sudan, can be traced back to a single individual in a Sudanese town.
sentences.cn: 苏丹埃博拉病毒最早可以追溯到苏丹小镇的一个人身上。

sentences.en: The Sudanese leader has left for a two-day visit to Zambia.
sentences.cn: 这位苏丹领导人已启程前往赞比亚进行为期两天的访问。

sentences.en: The Sudanese information minister Ahmed Belal Osman blamed the attack on Israeli air force.
sentences.cn: 苏丹情报部长奥斯曼在谴责以色列空军实施了此次袭击。
